presets.title: clean enhance
presets.text: enhance clarity, reduce noise, balance exposure, mild sharpening. keep original tones and identity. do not modify face, eyes, or hair.

presets.title: soft enhance
presets.text: slight clarity boost, gentle noise reduction, smooth highlights, protect skin texture. keep colors natural and identity unchanged.

presets.title: crisp detail
presets.text: increase micro-contrast and edge sharpness slightly, keep noise low. protect skin and do not change facial identity.

presets.title: light denoise
presets.text: reduce high-iso grain gently while preserving detail. keep natural textures and do not alter facial features.

presets.title: strong denoise
presets.text: significantly reduce noise in shadows, recover edges softly, avoid plastic look. keep face identity unchanged.

presets.title: dehaze sky
presets.text: reduce haze, increase sky contrast and clarity, maintain natural colors and realistic gradients.

presets.title: dehaze overall
presets.text: remove atmospheric haze across the image, restore midtone contrast, keep skin tones neutral.

presets.title: lift shadows
presets.text: raise shadow detail without flattening, keep blacks slightly rich and highlights controlled.

presets.title: recover highlights
presets.text: pull back clipped highlights, maintain contrast, protect skin tones from greying.

presets.title: exposure balance
presets.text: balance exposure overall: soft highlight rolloff, subtle shadow lift, keep midtones intact.

presets.title: gentle contrast
presets.text: add mild s-curve contrast, preserve midtones, keep skin and fabric texture realistic.

presets.title: deep contrast
presets.text: increase global contrast and deepen blacks slightly, protect highlight detail and skin.

presets.title: matte fade
presets.text: add a soft matte curve to blacks, reduce harsh contrast, keep colors neutral and clean.

presets.title: soft vignette
presets.text: add a gentle, natural vignette to draw attention to the center, avoid crushing blacks.

presets.title: strong vignette
presets.text: apply a noticeable vignette, maintain center exposure and protect skin tones.

presets.title: neutral color
presets.text: normalize white balance, reduce color casts, keep colors faithful and understated.

presets.title: color pop
presets.text: increase saturation slightly, add micro-contrast, keep skin tones accurate and not oversaturated.

presets.title: muted palette
presets.text: reduce saturation subtly, keep contrast balanced, maintain skin tone realism.

presets.title: warm up
presets.text: add warmth and golden tones carefully, keep whites neutral and skin natural.

presets.title: cool down
presets.text: cool the white balance slightly, maintain neutral skin tones and realistic whites.

presets.title: black & white balanced
presets.text: convert to monochrome with balanced contrast and preserved midtones. keep detail in shadows.

presets.title: black & white punchy
presets.text: monochrome with strong contrast and crisp edges, avoid haloing and banding.

presets.title: black & white soft
presets.text: gentle monochrome with soft highlights, protect facial detail and subtle gradients.

presets.title: black & white film vibe
presets.text: monochrome with slight grain and soft matte blacks, maintain natural textures.

presets.title: black & white documentary
presets.text: neutral monochrome, medium contrast, high detail retention, realistic tones.

presets.title: film look warm
presets.text: warm film-like color response, soft contrast, gentle grain, accurate skin.

presets.title: film look cool
presets.text: cool film vibe, lifted shadows, mild grain, keep whites clean and not cyan.

presets.title: film fade
presets.text: low contrast film fade, pastel colors, keep faces natural and readable.

presets.title: cinematic teal-orange
presets.text: subtle teal in shadows and warm highlights, not heavy-handed, keep skin realistic.

presets.title: cinematic neutral
presets.text: cine-grade contrast with neutral color bias, controlled highlights, lived-in texture.

presets.title: hdr natural
presets.text: expand dynamic range without looking artificial, protect local contrast and textures.

presets.title: hdr dramatic
presets.text: strong highlight and shadow recovery, intense detail, avoid halos and color shifts.

presets.title: golden hour glow
presets.text: warm highlights, soft shadows, subtle bloom, keep sky gradients smooth.

presets.title: blue hour
presets.text: enhance cool twilight tones, gentle contrast, maintain skin warmth and balance.

presets.title: neon night
presets.text: boost neon saturation, deepen blacks, preserve facial tones and highlight detail.

presets.title: shallow depth effect
presets.text: soften background with realistic lens blur, keep subject sharp, natural bokeh.

presets.title: tilt-shift mini look
presets.text: simulate tilt-shift: narrow focus band, gentle vignette, add subtle saturation.

presets.title: freeze motion
presets.text: increase clarity and micro-contrast to emphasize crisp edges, avoid oversharpening.

presets.title: soft motion trail
presets.text: add gentle directional motion blur to background only, keep subject sharp.

presets.title: soft glow
presets.text: add subtle bloom to highlights, keep midtones clean and faces readable.

presets.title: preserve skin tone
presets.text: protect skin hue and luminance while grading, avoid orange or green shifts.

presets.title: light skin smooth
presets.text: very light texture smoothing on skin while keeping pores visible and natural.

presets.title: even skin exposure
presets.text: even out facial exposure gently, remove hot spots, keep texture and identity.

presets.title: subtle teeth whiten
presets.text: brighten teeth slightly without bluish tint, keep gum color natural.

presets.title: eye clarity safe
presets.text: slightly enhance eye clarity and catchlight, avoid color change or shape change.

presets.title: neck-down retouch
presets.text: edit only below the neck: tidy clothing, reduce lint, balance torso lighting, keep texture.

presets.title: press clothing
presets.text: lightly reduce wrinkles in clothing, keep fabric texture realistic and not plastic.

presets.title: remove dust & lint
presets.text: remove visible lint and small dust on clothes and surfaces, avoid over-smoothing.

presets.title: jewelry pop
presets.text: increase micro-contrast and shine on metal jewelry, avoid glare on skin.

presets.title: shoe cleanup
presets.text: reduce scuffs and dust on shoes, keep shadows and leather texture realistic.

presets.title: background soften
presets.text: slightly blur and soften background distractions, keep subject crisp and centered.

presets.title: background replace: clean interior
presets.text: replace background with modern clean interior, match perspective and light, keep face unchanged.

presets.title: background replace: gray studio
presets.text: replace background with neutral gray studio backdrop, realistic soft shadow at feet if visible.

presets.title: background gradient
presets.text: swap background to a soft dark-to-light gradient, center the subject, keep lighting consistent.

presets.title: background replace: rooftop
presets.text: replace background with city rooftop at dusk, realistic haze and perspective, keep identity unchanged.

presets.title: auto white balance
presets.text: neutralize color cast, maintain skin tones, keep highlights clean and not tinted.

presets.title: daylight balance
presets.text: shift white balance toward daylight neutrality, avoid excessive warmth or coolness.

presets.title: tungsten correction
presets.text: counter warm indoor light, maintain natural skin and neutral whites.

presets.title: fluorescent correction
presets.text: remove green cast from fluorescent lighting, keep skin lifelike.

presets.title: mixed light balance
presets.text: stabilize color under mixed lighting, prioritize accurate skin and neutral whites.

presets.title: lens correction
presets.text: fix distortion and subtle chromatic aberration, keep geometry natural.

presets.title: vintage lens feel
presets.text: soft corners, mild vignette, gentle glow, preserve midframe sharpness.

presets.title: center clarity
presets.text: slightly enhance center sharpness and clarity, keep edges natural.

presets.title: bokeh boost
presets.text: emphasize background bokeh without artifacts, maintain subject edge integrity.

presets.title: subtle lens flare
presets.text: add a faint, realistic lens flare from light source direction, avoid faces.

presets.title: soft tone curve
presets.text: gentle s-curve, smoother highlights, richer shadows, keep skin not muddy.

presets.title: strong tone curve
presets.text: pronounced s-curve, deep blacks, crisp highlights, preserve detail.

presets.title: low-key look
presets.text: dark, moody exposure with controlled highlights, keep subject readable.

presets.title: high-key look
presets.text: bright overall exposure with soft shadows, maintain texture and not washed out.

presets.title: matte color film
presets.text: matte blacks and gentle saturation, slight grain, calm highlights.

presets.title: street neutral
presets.text: moderate contrast, balanced colors, clear midtones, keep a documentary feel.

presets.title: street moody
presets.text: cool shadows, soft highlights, increased texture on concrete and metal.

presets.title: street neon
presets.text: boost neon signs, deepen night sky, keep skin accurate and not magenta.

presets.title: street blackgold
presets.text: deep blacks with warm highlights, gentle grain, realistic reflections.

presets.title: street film soft
presets.text: film-like softness, pastel colors, matte blacks, maintain clarity on subject.

presets.title: portrait natural
presets.text: natural color, light contrast, soft skin smoothing, retain pores and identity.

presets.title: portrait studio
presets.text: clean studio contrast, subtle catchlights, balanced skin tones, no identity change.

presets.title: portrait outdoor
presets.text: gentle warmth, lifted shadows, protect sky and foliage colors, natural skin.

presets.title: portrait low light
presets.text: reduce noise, soften specular highlights, keep eyes clear and identity accurate.

presets.title: portrait matte
presets.text: soft blacks, delicate highlights, light grain, preserve skin texture.

presets.title: product clean
presets.text: neutral white balance, high clarity edges, minimal shadows, no color cast.

presets.title: product matte
presets.text: reduced specular highlights, soft contrast, true-to-life color.

presets.title: product reflection control
presets.text: tame glare and reflections while preserving shape and realism.

presets.title: product pop
presets.text: increase micro-contrast and saturation slightly, keep whites clean.

presets.title: product dark backdrop
presets.text: move product onto a deep charcoal backdrop, soft rim light, realistic shadow.

presets.title: landscape vibrant
presets.text: boost greens and blues gently, add clarity, keep clouds natural.

presets.title: landscape golden
presets.text: warm highlights, soft haze, balanced saturation, clean skies.

presets.title: landscape matte
presets.text: matte blacks, subtle color, gentle contrast, maintain depth.

presets.title: landscape fog
presets.text: enhance fog and atmosphere, lower contrast, keep details readable.

presets.title: landscape deep tones
presets.text: rich shadows and crisp highlights, controlled saturation, natural horizon.

presets.title: sky boost
presets.text: increase sky saturation and structure slightly, keep edges clean and halos absent.

presets.title: sky drama
presets.text: dramatic cloud contrast, recover highlight structure, natural gradient.

presets.title: clear water
presets.text: enhance water clarity, reduce color cast, keep reflections realistic.

presets.title: rich foliage
presets.text: boost foliage luminance and saturation mildly, avoid radioactive greens.

presets.title: warm sand
presets.text: soft golden tint to sand and rocks, maintain neutral whites.

presets.title: architecture clean
presets.text: fix verticals, remove subtle haze, increase edge clarity, neutral color.

presets.title: architecture matte
presets.text: matte blacks, gentle highlights, slight desaturation for a modern look.

presets.title: architecture dusk
presets.text: blue hour emphasis, window warmth, balance noise and detail.

presets.title: architecture b&w
presets.text: monochrome with strong geometry contrast, clean whites, deep blacks.

presets.title: architecture texture
presets.text: enhance textures like brick and metal, maintain natural color.

presets.title: food fresh
presets.text: increase saturation locally, keep whites clean, enhance micro-contrast on edges.

presets.title: food warm cozy
presets.text: warm tones, soft highlights, gentle vignette, keep greens natural.

presets.title: food matte
presets.text: matte blacks, reduced glare, maintain appetizing color.

presets.title: food bright
presets.text: bright exposure, clean whites, crisp edges, minimal shadows.

presets.title: food dark mood
presets.text: low-key contrast, spotlight effect, rich color without over-saturation.

presets.title: mirror cleanup
presets.text: reduce mirror smudges and dust, soften harsh flash, keep reflection realistic.

presets.title: soften flash
presets.text: reduce specular hotspots from flash, even out exposure, maintain detail.

presets.title: phone glare control
presets.text: tame glare on phone screen and keep edges sharp, preserve realism.

presets.title: handheld vibe
presets.text: retain handheld look with mild grain and natural motion feel, keep clarity on subject.

presets.title: remove small background specks
presets.text: remove minor dust and small distractions in background, keep texture.

presets.title: clothing swap (generic)
presets.text: put this upper body clothing on. put this lower body clothing on. match lighting and fabric texture. edit neck and below only; leave face and hair unchanged.

presets.title: match clothing color
presets.text: adjust clothing color to match reference swatch, keep realistic shading and texture.

presets.title: remove small logos
presets.text: remove small brand marks on clothing, preserve folds and texture.

presets.title: reduce clothing wrinkles
presets.text: softly reduce creases while keeping natural fabric grain.

presets.title: fabric micro-contrast
presets.text: increase fine detail on fabric stitching and seams, subtle effect only.

presets.title: background replace: park
presets.text: replace background with soft park greenery, match light direction, keep identity unchanged.

presets.title: background replace: beach
presets.text: replace with beach scene, soft warm light, natural horizon, maintain subject realism.

presets.title: background replace: library
presets.text: replace with modern library interior, neutral color, realistic depth of field.

presets.title: background replace: cafe
presets.text: replace with cozy cafe interior, warm lights, realistic perspective.

presets.title: background replace: brick wall
presets.text: replace background with textured brick wall, gentle vignette, keep subject crisp.

presets.title: anti-halo edges
presets.text: remove sharpening halos, keep edges clean and natural, preserve detail.

presets.title: midtone clarity
presets.text: increase clarity mainly in midtones, protect shadows and highlights.

presets.title: texture boost
presets.text: add fine texture to non-skin surfaces, keep skin smooth and natural.

presets.title: fine grain
presets.text: add fine film-like grain, subtle and uniform, avoid banding.

presets.title: medium grain
presets.text: add slightly stronger grain for mood, keep skin readable and not gritty.

presets.title: rembrandt lighting feel
presets.text: enhance triangle light on cheek, soft shadows, maintain realistic falloff.

presets.title: butterfly lighting feel
presets.text: enhance frontal soft light with slight under-nose shadow, keep skin natural.

presets.title: split lighting feel
presets.text: deepen one side shadows, keep highlight side natural, preserve detail.

presets.title: rim light accent
presets.text: add gentle rim light on edges of subject, maintain main exposure.

presets.title: backlit balance
presets.text: balance backlight glow with subject exposure, keep color cast neutral.

presets.title: tame greens
presets.text: reduce green saturation slightly, shift hue toward natural foliage, keep skin clean.

presets.title: deep blues
presets.text: deepen blue tones in sky and water, avoid banding and cyan shift.

presets.title: warm reds
presets.text: warm and soften reds slightly, keep skin and lips natural.

presets.title: skin-safe oranges
presets.text: stabilize orange range to protect skin hue and luminance.

presets.title: neutralize purples
presets.text: reduce unwanted purple shifts in shadows, keep blacks neutral.

presets.title: selective color desat
presets.text: desaturate background slightly while keeping subject color, avoid halos.

presets.title: subject color hold
presets.text: maintain subject saturation, gently reduce overall saturation for separation.

presets.title: selective face brighten
presets.text: lift exposure on face subtly, keep background unchanged, preserve texture.

presets.title: selective darken background
presets.text: dim background by a small amount, keep subject exposure consistent.

presets.title: highlight hair detail
presets.text: add mild contrast to hair strands, avoid color shift or halo.

presets.title: center composition
presets.text: nudge framing so the subject is centered, maintain aspect ratio, avoid cropping out key elements.

presets.title: rule of thirds
presets.text: adjust framing toward rule of thirds alignment, keep subject intact.

presets.title: headroom fix
presets.text: add or reduce headroom for balanced framing, avoid stretching.

presets.title: straighten horizon
presets.text: level the image and correct tilt, keep proportions and edges clean.

presets.title: tighten crop
presets.text: crop slightly to remove dead space, keep limbs and important details.
